metadata.description: Cognitive Construct - A modular AI enhancement system comprising four skills for knowledge, reasoning, memory, and agency.

plugins.name: encyclopedia
plugins.description: Knowledge retrieval from multiple sources. Search docs, web, and code with intelligent routing.

plugins.name: inland-empire
plugins.description: Unified memory substrate. Store facts, patterns, and context. Query with remember, consult, and stats commands.

plugins.name: rhetoric
plugins.description: Structured reasoning and deliberation. Record thoughts, deliberate on decisions, review thinking patterns.

plugins.name: volition
plugins.description: Agency and execution. Edit code semantically, invoke LLMs, search the web, and query security services.
